testCases.label: Verify filtering employees using AND conditions
testCases.description: Runs problem1(), which should return only employees matching both filter conditions. Verifies that only Employee(id=3, Steve Jones) is returned.

testCases.label: Verify filtering employees using OR conditions
testCases.description: Runs problem2(), which should return employees who meet either of the OR conditions. Verifies that Alexa Smith and Brandon Smith are returned.

testCases.label: Verify filtering employees using NOT IN logic
testCases.description: Runs problem3(), which should return employees excluded from a specified set. Verifies that Adam Jones and Brandon Smith are returned.
